languages.text: Travellers arriving on Footfall bring with them rumours of the Emperor's blessed Angels coming to the region to repel the xenothreat. The holy warriors are few in number and are fighting in the farthest-flung reaches of the Koronus Expanse.
languages.original_text: Странники, прибывающие на Футфол, передают слухи о благословенных ангелах Императора, прибывших в регион для отражения ксеноугрозы. Священные воины малочисленны и сражаются в самых отдаленных уголках Простора Коронус.

traits.locale_text: Travellers arriving on Footfall bring with them rumours of the Emperor's blessed angels coming to the region to repel the xenothreat. The holy warriors are few in number and are fighting in the farthest-flung reaches of the Koronus Expanse.

Travellers arriving on Footfall bring with them rumours of the Emperor's blessed angels coming to the region to repel the xenothreat. The holy warriors are few in number and are fighting in the farthest-flung reaches of the Koronus Expanse.

Travellers arriving on Footfall bring with them rumours of the Emperor's blessed angels coming to the region to repel the xenothreat. The holy warriors are few in number and are fighting in the farthest-flung reaches of the Koronus Expanse.

Travellers arriving on Footfall bring with them rumours of the Emperor's blessed angels coming to the region to repel the xenothreat. The holy warriors are few in number and are fighting in the farthest-flung reaches of the Koronus Expanse.

languages.text: Странники, прибывающие на Футфол, передают слухи о благословенных ангелах Императора, прибывших в регион для отражения ксеноугрозы. Священные воины малочисленны и сражаются в самых отдаленных уголках Простора Коронус.
落脚港的旅行者带来了传言，说受到帝皇祝福的天使也来到了科罗努斯扩区，准备击退这里的异形威胁。他们说，那些神圣的战士数量不多，目前正在科罗努斯扩区最偏远的地区作战。
languages.original_text: Travellers arriving on Footfall bring with them rumours of the Emperor's blessed Angels coming to the region to repel the xenothreat. The holy warriors are few in number and are fighting in the farthest-flung reaches of the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 落脚港的旅行者带来了传言，说受到帝皇祝福的天使也来到了科罗努斯扩区，准备击退这里的异形威胁。他们说，那些神圣的战士数量不多，目前正在科罗努斯扩区最偏远的地区作战。

languages.text: フットフォールに到着した旅行者は、皇帝の祝福を受けた天使たちが異種族による脅威を撃退するためにこの地域にやってくるという噂をする。数少ない聖戦士らはコロヌス・エクスパンスの最果てで戦っている。
languages.original_text: Travellers arriving on Footfall bring with them rumours of the Emperor's blessed Angels coming to the region to repel the xenothreat. The holy warriors are few in number and are fighting in the farthest-flung reaches of the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: フットフォールに到着した旅行者は、皇帝の祝福を受けた天使たちが異種族による脅威を撃退するためにこの地域にやってくるという噂をする。数少ない聖戦士らはコロヌス・エクスパンスの最果てで戦っている。

languages.text: Los viajeros que llegan a Paso traen rumores de que los benditos ángeles del Emperador están en la región para hacer frente a la amenaza xenos. Estos guerreros sagrados son escasos en número y luchan en los confines más lejanos de la Extensión de Koronus.
languages.original_text: Travellers arriving on Footfall bring with them rumours of the Emperor's blessed Angels coming to the region to repel the xenothreat. The holy warriors are few in number and are fighting in the farthest-flung reaches of the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Los viajeros que llegan a Paso traen rumores de que los benditos ángeles del Emperador están en la región para hacer frente a la amenaza xenos. Estos guerreros sagrados son escasos en número y luchan en los confines más lejanos de la Extensión de Koronus.

languages.text: Reisende, die Footfall besuchen, verbreiten Gerüchten, wonach die gesegneten Engel des Imperators in die Region kommen werden, um die Bedrohung durch die Xenos zu beseitigen. Die Zahl der heiligen Krieger ist gering und sie kämpfen in den entlegensten Winkeln der Koronus-Ausdehnung.
languages.original_text: Travellers arriving on Footfall bring with them rumours of the Emperor's blessed Angels coming to the region to repel the xenothreat. The holy warriors are few in number and are fighting in the farthest-flung reaches of the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Reisende, die Footfall besuchen, verbreiten Gerüchten, wonach die gesegneten Engel des Imperators in die Region kommen werden, um die Bedrohung durch die Xenos zu beseitigen. Die Zahl der heiligen Krieger ist gering und sie kämpfen in den entlegensten Winkeln der Koronus-Ausdehnung.

languages.text: Selon les voyageurs arrivant à Castel, les anges bénis de l'Empereur seraient venus repousser la menace des xénos. Les guerriers saints sont peu nombreux et combattent dans les confins des Étendues de Koronus.
languages.original_text: Travellers arriving on Footfall bring with them rumours of the Emperor's blessed Angels coming to the region to repel the xenothreat. The holy warriors are few in number and are fighting in the farthest-flung reaches of the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Selon les voyageurs arrivant à Caste, les anges bénis de l'Empereur seraient venus repousser la menace des xénos. Les guerriers saints sont peu nombreux et combattent dans les confins des Étendues de Koronus.

languages.text: Binliman'a gelen yolcular, bölgedeki zeno tehdidini savuşturmak adına İmparator'un kutsanmış Meleklerinin yola çıktığına dair söylentiler yayıyor. Kutsal savaşçılar sayıca az ve Koronus Enginliği'nin en uç köşelerinde savaş veriyor.
languages.original_text: Travellers arriving on Footfall bring with them rumours of the Emperor's blessed Angels coming to the region to repel the xenothreat. The holy warriors are few in number and are fighting in the farthest-flung reaches of the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Binliman'a gelen yolcular, bölgedeki zeno tehdidini savuşturmak adına İmparator'un kutsanmış Meleklerinin yola çıktığına dair söylentiler yayıyor. Kutsal savaşçılar sayıca az ve Koronus Enginliği'nin en uç köşelerinde savaş veriyor.
